name: Hyves respect button
author: Martijn Heesters - d-Media

sections.description:
Automatically add Hyves respect buttons to your posts. It works for single pages and loops and is display options are customizable.

** Please deactivate this plugin, the Hyves social network has been shut down**
More information can be found here.

We would like to thank everyone for using this plugin.

Arbitrary section
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Unzip and move the hyves-respect folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress
  3. After activation you can configure the plugin using the settings link or the menu
sections.faq:
Is the plugin available in Dutch ?

There is a Dutch language file included with this plugin.

Can you customize this plugin for me ?

Sure, just contact our company (http://d-media.nl) for more information

Where can i find more info on the specs for this button ?

Specifications (in Dutch) for hyves respect button can be found here:
http://www.hyves.nl/respect/
sections.changelog:
1.4

  • Added warning that plugin is now obsolute since Hyves has been shut down

1.3.2

  • Included Romanian language support

1.3.1

  • Added pointer which points you to the new layout feature (only shown once)

1.3

  • Added button layout selection (horizontal, vertical, no count)
  • Updated screenshot admin options page screenshot

1.2

  • Forgot to uncomment a function, fixed

1.1

  • Added screenshot of the options page
  • Added custom styling functionality
  • Renamed function names to avoid conflicts with other modules
  • Updated Dutch translation
  • Added support paragraph on options page
  • Options page is now W3C validated

1.0

  • First stable release
